channel.title: LOL A Lot Less RWT For RS Noobs: Chinese government bans gold farming
channel.description:
http://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/chinese-government-bans-gold-farming
I actually was shocked to believe this, but funny. I found this on [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/VengenceOfHansenmol]Hansenmol's[/url] Youtube channel. Comment & speak about what you think of this. If you dont think of anything about this don't post anything at all.

item.title: LOL A Lot Less RWT For RS Noobs: Chinese government bans gold farming
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

casey.:

It’ll just turn into an underground business. It’s not going to stop.

Yeah, that is what I think too because China’s population or gaming population you could say is too large to have some sort of control against.

Read full topic
item.source: LOL A Lot Less RWT For RS Noobs: Chinese government bans gold farming

item.title: LOL A Lot Less RWT For RS Noobs: Chinese government bans gold farming
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:15, topic:286914”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=379432.msg2853856#msg2853856 date=1246717877]

Wow, china just cut it’s own head off with this one. I imagine a lot of emigration from china now. Only thing left in China is fake iphone factories, and rice patties.

Urr, so why is China one of the leading economy’s in the world, they’re not even in recession while countrys such as America, UK, France, Germany, etc all are.

Your statement that there is only a few things left in China is bizarre

It was a joke, you fucking retard.

It’s funny how you think you’re funny

And yeah, this wont stop a thing. They’ll still do it in China, there is no way to stop it.
[/quote]

Did I think I was being funny? No. I did it with the intention of getting a rise out of someone. That’s what is really funny, is pissing little faggots like you and The_flames off.[/quote]

It’s funny when you try to rant

no more sweaty asians dieing in small rooms in 3rd world countries. +9999 to world population

I don’t think they actually die. CNN or one of the big news stations did a report on them, and the conditions are actually really nice. The operators make sure all the workers are healthy, have a clean environment, etc. Then again, I know there are some where they work in small dark rooms and live on floors… Those ones, I agree that they close. The good ones though, I see no problem with

Read full topic
item.source: LOL A Lot Less RWT For RS Noobs: Chinese government bans gold farming
